name: Abbys Endless Adventure
description:
Abbys Endless Adventure

In Abby's endless adventure, Abby tries to escape from the mystery "endless" labyrinth to the final, including her 3 friends Lisa, John, Berno.

Mega Feature: Online Leaderboard for mess with players around the world.

How did you get into the labyrinth?
They crashed their airship onto the island Labyrinthia
even more story comes in 2018 with the game Abby's Adventure.

Patch V1.13.5

 Season 1 begins
